I think it depends on the girl; but, that said, it does not take me 30 minutes or anywhere close. If you do your foreplay right, it can happen pretty quickly. I'm a zoology major at Michigan State and, really, I've learned so much. Animals are really my passion; I'm not looking to go to vet school, but moreso in something that's conservation-focused. Be prepared for a lot of science-related classes, I know that sounds obvious, but some people go into shell shock. If you don't like biology, I wouldn't recommend it, of course. Here, we have a lot of concentrations you can go into, like neurology, animal behavior, zoo and aquarium science, etc. I graduate this year so I can't tell you about the pay haha, but check out that site from below!
